data.title: Mercy Mission: The Rescue Of Flight 771 (DVD) 1993 Scott Bakula
data.meta_description:
Mercy Mission: The Rescue of Flight 771 (1993) DVD (Region 1 - Playable in North America - The US, Canada, Mexico, etc.) Color.

Starring: Robert Loggia, Scott Bakula, Kit Taylor. Written by George Rubino and Robert Benedetti. Directed by Robert Young.

The true, riveting story of a brave single-engine aircraft pilot lost over stormy seas and the veteran commercial airline captain who, along with a plane full of passengers, guides him to safety.

Jay is ordered to fly Cessna flight 30771 from the States to Sydney, with stopovers at Honolulu, Pago Pago and Norfolk Island. He's joined by Frank, who flies another Cessna. Frank crashes while taking off at Pago Pago, so Jay has to find Norfolk Island on his own. He gets lost and is quickly running out of fuel. He contacts Gordon Vette by accident, the pilot of the ANZ 308, a plane with 88 passengers on board. He and his crew are the only ones who can save Jay. But to save him, they first have to find him...
"Sometimes heroes just come out of the blue."
